string.name: continue_desc
string.value:
Start something on one device, then pick it up on another. For example, you can start a note on your phone, then finish it on your tablet.

To use Continuity, devices need to be close together, using the same HUAWEI ID, and have WLAN, Bluetooth, as well as this feature enabled.

string.name: continue_privacy_text
string.value: This service uses Bluetooth and WLAN. During use, it will read this device's name and send it to devices you hop to. By turning this on, you agree to these terms.
